text:
VEGETARIA - a land of sentient bunnies and plentiful vegetables. The bunnies of VEGETARIA lived in peace,
until one day...
It all happened so fast! CARROT TOP - the highest point in Vegetaria - emitted a dark aura. Then, farmers' crops sprouted monstrous faces and limbs.
Uprooting themselves as feral monsters, these vicious veggies drove the bunnies out of VEGETARIA, claiming it as their own.

Now, the bunnies of VEGETARIA entrust 4 brave bunnies with reclaiming their land.
Go, bunnies! Save VEGETARIA!
